name: Democratic Republic of the Congo
update_reason: FCDO now advises against all but essential travel to Bangoka International Airport in Kisangani. FDCO no longer advises against all but essential travel to the district of Kasa Vubu in Kinshasa city bordered by the N1 Triumphal Road (Stadium), Barumbu District, Lingwala district and south of the Botanical Garden ('Warnings and insurance' page).
